mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member_info (id, password, name, resident_num, email, address, phoneNum, add_phone_num, birth, gender) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{residentNum}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phoneNum}, #{addPhoneNum}, #{birth}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select count(id) from tbl_member_info where id = #{id}
select name from tbl_member_info where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
select id from tbl_member_info where email = #{email} and name = #{name} and birth = #{birth}
select id from tbl_member_info where phoneNum = #{phoneNum} and name = #{name} and birth = #{birth}
select password from tbl_member_info where id = #{id} and email = #{email} and name = #{name} and birth = #{birth}
select password from tbl_member_info where id = #{id} and phoneNum = #{phoneNum} and name = #{name} and birth = #{birth}
